definition: located close together, to judge tentatively or form an estimate of quantities or time
details:
adjective
- located close together
= synonyms: close together
- very close in resemblance
= example: very close in resemblance
= synonyms: near
- not quite exact or correct
= example: not quite exact or correct
= synonyms: rough
verb
- to judge tentatively or form an estimate of quantities or time
= example: to judge tentatively or form an estimate of quantities or time
= synonyms: estimate
- to be close or similar
= example: to be close or similar
= synonyms: come close
